text: Are these TOO ripe for banana bread??
Was ready to make banana bread when I see that my bananas are gone, because my room mate threw them out for being "bad"

LPT: you shouldn't feed ducks bread, but they go nuts over a bag of cheap frozen peas or corn my birthday was yesterday. spent less than $5 on some bags of frozen corn and peas, and took those and some freezer-burned lima beans to my local pond to feed the ducks. literally every single duck and coot from the pond was gathered around me eating. 10/10 will do again
Part of my bread recipe wanted me to put water in a pan halfway through baking. I poured water into the hot pan and it exploded in my oven
